snippet: A week after a hillside collapsed, officials said that 253 bodies had been recovered and that 374 people were still missing.
abstract: Guatemalan disaster officials recover 253 bodies, victims of hillside collapse in El Cambray II neighborhood of Guatemala City, and report 374 people still missing; have not yet declared area state of disaster but urge residents living near site to leave as precaution.
lead_paragraph: A week after a hillside collapsed, officials said that 253 bodies had been recovered and that 374 people were still missing.

headline.main: Guatemala: More Bodies Are Recovered in Neighborhood Hit by Landslide
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Guatemala: More Bodies Are Recovered in a Neighborhood Hit by a Landslide
